Sentencas: Fe-doped lanthanum strontium chromites, i.e., La0.8Sr0.2Cr1-xFexO3-delta (x = 0.1, 0.2, 0.3, 0.4, and 0.5), are synthesised and evaluated as potential interconnect materials for SOFCs.
Titulo: A modified liquid-phase-assisted sintering mechanism for La0.8Sr0.2Cr1-xFexO3-δ-A high density, redox-stable perovskite interconnect for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A modified liquid-phase-assisted sintering mechanism is employed to improve the sintering abilities of la(0.8)Sr(0.2)Cr(1-x)Fe(x)O(3-delta) powders.
Titulo: A modified liquid-phase-assisted sintering mechanism for La0.8Sr0.2Cr1-xFexO3-δ-A high density, redox-stable perovskite interconnect for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A distinct transient liquid phase forms during the sintering process, which spreads into a uniform layer and covers the grain boundaries, thereby enhancing densification.
Titulo: A modified liquid-phase-assisted sintering mechanism for La0.8Sr0.2Cr1-xFexO3-δ-A high density, redox-stable perovskite interconnect for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Additionally, it is determined that the amount of liquid phase formed during liquid-phase-assisted sintering significantly affects the densification of doped lanthanum chromites.
Titulo: A modified liquid-phase-assisted sintering mechanism for La0.8Sr0.2Cr1-xFexO3-δ-A high density, redox-stable perovskite interconnect for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Relative densities of 94.6% and 96.6% are successfully obtained for La0.8Sr0.2Cr0.6Fe0.4O3-delta and La0.8Sr0.2Cr0.5Fe0.5O3-delta, respectively.
Titulo: A modified liquid-phase-assisted sintering mechanism for La0.8Sr0.2Cr1-xFexO3-δ-A high density, redox-stable perovskite interconnect for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, these compounds are also redox-stable after being heated to 900 degrees C in flowing H-2 for 6 h. The electrical conductivity increases with Fe-doping levels, and the conductivity of La0.8Sr0.2Cr0.5Fe0.5O3-delta is measured to be 21.88 S cm(-1) in air and 6.45 S cm(-1) in 5% H-2/Ar at 800 degrees C. Therefore, dense La0.8Sr0.2Cr0.5Fe0.5O3-delta is a promising interconnect alternative for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: A modified liquid-phase-assisted sintering mechanism for La0.8Sr0.2Cr1-xFexO3-δ-A high density, redox-stable perovskite interconnect for solid oxide fuel cells
A modified liquid-phase-assisted sintering mechanism for La0.8Sr0.2Cr1-xFexO3-δ-A high density, redox-stable perovskite interconnect for solid oxide fuel cells
